abstract: Authorities in San Francisco charge migrant Francisco Sanchez, who has been deported five times, with murder of Kathryn Steinle, who was shot to death at a sightseeing pier.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in San Francisco have charged an immigrant in the country illegally with murder in the shooting death of a woman at a sightseeing pier last week.

headline.main: California: Migrant, Deported 5 Times, Is Charged in Murder
headline.print_headline: California: Migrant, Deported 5 Times, Is Charged in Murder

snippet: Prosecutors in San Francisco have charged an immigrant in the country illegally with murder in the shooting death of a woman at a sightseeing pier last week.
